categories: Category:Battles of the Galactic Civil War

nodes.text: After the destruction of Relentless, Operation Blunt Stick was a brief operation led by Keyan Farlander to destroy an Imperial listening probe in a minefield, in order to allow the Rebel fleet to migrate to Hoth unnoticed.
On that operation, Imperial Corvette groups TIE Fire and Striker were destroyed, along with the three BFF-1 bulk freighters, which were carrying mines, Kan, Kant and Wunt.
